name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Skilled Software Developer with 13+ years of experience, specializing in **MERN stack** technologies including **Node.js**, **Express.js**, and **ReactJS**. Adept in using **TypeScript** for robust application development, and experienced with **Redux**, **Redux-Saga**, and **Reselect** for state management. Proficient in styling with **Styled Components** and ensuring quality through testing frameworks such as **Jest** and **Mocha**.

Strong expertise in building scalable applications across sectors such as healthcare and finance, particularly in delivering high-performance solutions utilizing JavaScript, Python, and **Flutter**. Hands-on experience with cloud technologies, specifically deploying systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, as well as implementing microservices and CI/CD workflows with **Git**, **GitLab**, **GitLab CI**, and **Jira**.

Well-versed in real-time processing and automation, with a strong foundation in AI/ML applications powered by technologies such as **FastAPI** and **Django**, providing predictive analytics capabilities. Experienced in compliance-driven development under frameworks like HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS.
